sentences.en: He moped about in the house all day.
sentences.cn: 他整天没精打采地在家里闲荡.

sentences.en: He moped around the office for a while, feeling bored.
sentences.cn: 他在办公室闲荡了一会儿，感到百无聊赖。

sentences.en: He moped in the house all day.
sentences.cn: 他整天闷闷不乐地呆在屋里.

sentences.en: I would advise against riding moped without testing the brakes first .
sentences.cn: 我反对不先试一下闸就骑机动脚踏两用车。

sentences.en: I would advise against riding the moped without testing the brakes first.
sentences.cn: 我反对不先试一下闸就骑机器脚踏两用车.

sentences.en: Look at that family on a moped!
sentences.cn: 看看脚踏车上的那一家子！

sentences.en: Mona has just got hold of a brilliant moped that only cost a tenner.
sentences.cn: 莫娜有一辆只值十磅的脚踏车.

sentences.en: Neville Ebin died in Bermuda when a taxi knocked him off his moped.
sentences.cn: 内维尔.艾宾在百慕大?机动脚踏两用车时被一辆出租车撞死.

sentences.en: Neville Ebin died in Bermuda when a taxi moped.
sentences.cn: 内维尔.艾宾在百慕大踦机动脚踏两用车时被一辆出租车撞死.

sentences.en: Perhaps a moped would be more suitable.
sentences.cn: 也许机动自行车比较适合.

sentences.en: That mountain Bike was refitted to become a moped.
sentences.cn: 那辆山地车已经被改装成了一辆助力车.

sentences.en: The GB 16169 - 2000 moped noise limit issued in 2000 equally adopts the limit of ECE, EC.
sentences.cn: 我国2000年修订并发布的GB16169-2000轻便摩托车噪声限值等同采用ECE 、 EC的限值规定.

sentences.en: The rich man always moped about that.
sentences.cn: 这个富人总是为此闷闷不乐.

sentences.en: The serene woman has already ordered pizza moped - mounted delivery man is on the way with it.
sentences.cn: 原来她已经订了比萨,此时配送人员正骑着送货车在送餐路上.

words.tran_cn: 使忧郁；没精打采地度过

trans.tran_en: a small two-wheeled vehicle with an engine

trans.tran_cn: <贬>忧郁地闲荡( mope的过去式和过去分词 )
